sentence: The room was reasonable even though the bathroom door had been kicked in and was not repaired
So that is really the only downside and easily repaired
I waited until 230 before going to bed still no maintenance or house cleaning
We had a little problem and their maintenance man could not have been quicker or friendlier
We also had issues with the key cards not working in the lower unit and had to call maintenance
This hotel needs a lot of maintenance

Have not received any emails from the resort in regards to my reservation and see nothing on the website and the phone keeps sending me to a voice mailHey Costumer support any details or updates would be very helpful
I think that ’s it horrible that it took so long to figure out that the renovations would be delayed and you waited until almost the last second to contact customers
The pool area and some of the other areas were off limits due to maintenance
We stayed here while they were finishing up renovations so I am cutting them a little slack on a few issues we had based on that ie
Nice clean and newly remodeled hotel
The hotel had just remodeled after the Hurricane and they did an amazing job
Look out for the hidden fees parking hotel services very clean newly renovated friendly staff
This property has tons of potential but needs a overhaul in customer service to be somewhere I would recommend or return to
The staff were very eager to please during this phase of finishing renovation and getting the restaurant open
Facilities were newly remodeled due to hurricane Irma so was sparkling new
NEWLY RENOVATED after the storm and impressive
Beautiful hotel newly renovated rooms spacious and clean
All rooms were updated the facilities great pool and Gym close to Duval street
Updated with four pools and condo style rooms that were recently completely remodeled
